Warnings
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/anchor: unknown concept "BoxModel"
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/anchor

Function
  • FProperty anchor(num h, num v)
  • FProperty anchor(computedNum h, computedNum v)
Description anchor sets the horizontal anchor to h% of the current width and the vertical anchor to v% of the current height.

Also see BoxModel.
Examples
  • anchor(1.0, 0.5) sets the horizontal anchor to 100% of the current width (= right aligned) and the vertical anchor to 50% of the current height (= vertically centered).
